argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i j k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rpvmasum.z | |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 2 |  | rpvmasum.l | |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) |
| 3 |  | rpvmasum.a | |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) |
| 4 |  | rpvmasum2.g | |- G = ( DChr ` N ) |
| 5 |  | rpvmasum2.d | |- D = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 |  | rpvmasum2.1 | |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 7 |  | dchrisum0f.f | |- F = ( b e. NN |-> sum_ v e. { q e. NN | q || b } ( X ` ( L ` v ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | dchrisum0f.x | |- ( ph -> X e. D ) |
| 9 |  | dchrisum0fmul.a | |- ( ph -> A e. NN ) |
| 10 |  | dchrisum0fmul.b | |- ( ph -> B e. NN ) |
| 11 |  | dchrisum0fmul.m | |- ( ph -> ( A gcd B ) = 1 ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- { q e. NN | q || A } = { q e. NN | q || A } |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- { q e. NN | q || B } = { q e. NN | q || B } |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- { q e. NN | q || ( A x. B ) } = { q e. NN | q || ( A x. B ) } |
| 15 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ) -> X e. D ) |
| 16 |  | #P_elrabi | |- ( j e. { q e. NN | q || A } -> j e. NN ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_nnzd | |- ( j e. { q e. NN | q || A } -> j e. ZZ ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ) -> j e. ZZ ) |
| 19 | 4, 1, 5, 2, 15, 18 | #P_dchrzrhcl | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ) -> ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) e. CC ) |
| 20 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ) -> X e. D ) |
| 21 |  | #P_elrabi | |- ( k e. { q e. NN | q || B } -> k e. NN ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_nnzd | |- ( k e. { q e. NN | q || B } -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ) -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 24 | 4, 1, 5, 2, 20, 23 | #P_dchrzrhcl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ) -> ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 25 | 17, 22 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( j e. { q e. NN | q || A } /\ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ) -> ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) |
| 26 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) -> X e. D ) |
| 27 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) -> j e. ZZ ) |
| 28 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 29 | 4, 1, 5, 2, 26, 27, 28 | #P_dchrzrhmul | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) -> ( X ` ( L ` ( j x. k ) ) ) = ( ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) x. ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. ZZ /\ k e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) x. ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) = ( X ` ( L ` ( j x. k ) ) ) ) |
| 31 | 25, 30 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. { q e. NN | q || A } /\ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ) ) -> ( ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) x. ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) = ( X ` ( L ` ( j x. k ) ) ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( i = ( j x. k ) -> ( L ` i ) = ( L ` ( j x. k ) ) ) |
| 33 | 32 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( i = ( j x. k ) -> ( X ` ( L ` i ) ) = ( X ` ( L ` ( j x. k ) ) ) ) |
| 34 | 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 19, 24, 31, 33 | #P_fsumdvdsmul | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) x. sum_ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) = sum_ i e. { q e. NN | q || ( A x. B ) } ( X ` ( L ` i ) ) ) |
| 35 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_dchrisum0fval | |- ( A e. NN -> ( F ` A ) = sum_ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) ) |
| 36 | 9, 35 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) = sum_ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) ) |
| 37 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_dchrisum0fval | |- ( B e. NN -> ( F ` B ) = sum_ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) |
| 38 | 10, 37 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( F ` B ) = sum_ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) |
| 39 | 36, 38 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` A ) x. ( F ` B ) ) = ( sum_ j e. { q e. NN | q || A } ( X ` ( L ` j ) ) x. sum_ k e. { q e. NN | q || B } ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) ) ) |
| 40 | 9, 10 | #P_nnmulcld | |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) e. NN ) |
| 41 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_dchrisum0fval | |- ( ( A x. B ) e. NN -> ( F ` ( A x. B ) ) = sum_ i e. { q e. NN | q || ( A x. B ) } ( X ` ( L ` i ) ) ) |
| 42 | 40, 41 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( F ` ( A x. B ) ) = sum_ i e. { q e. NN | q || ( A x. B ) } ( X ` ( L ` i ) ) ) |
| 43 | 34, 39, 42 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) x. ( F ` B ) ) ) |
